text: w'in bedana min 'ahl alkitab laysddiq biallah rbbana wahdana w'ilhana mebwdana, wabima 'unzil 'iilaykum min hdha alqran, wabima 'unzil 'iilayhim min altawrat wal'iinjil mtdhllyn llh, khadiein lh, la yashtarun biayat allah thmnana qalilana min hutam aldnya, wala yaktumun ma 'anzal allh, wala yuharifunah kghyrhm min 'ahl alktab. 'uwlayik lahum thawab eazim eindah yawm ylqwnh, fayuafiyhim 'iiaah ghyr mnqws. 'inn allah sarie alhsab, la yejzh 'iihsa' aemalhm, wmhasbthm elyha
